meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the June 12, 2024 City Council Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the ratification of a service contract for emergency repairs and modernization of the four elevators within the Hall Arts Garage
agenda_items.description: Contract with K & M Elevator, LLC, not to exceed $755,980.00.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Juanita Rodriguez v. The City of Dallas
Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Jose Posada v. City of Dallas, Texas
Authorize acceptance of a grant from the Texas Veterans Commission
agenda_items.description: Grant for continuation of the South Oak Cliff Community Court, not to exceed $50,000.00.

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the selection of an underwriting syndicate for the issuance of bonds
agenda_items.description: Related to the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas Venue Project.

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the execution of the First Amendment to Revolving Credit Agreement
agenda_items.description: Support of the City of Dallas Waterworks and Sewer System Commercial Paper Notes.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds
An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds
Authorize acceptance of a loan from the Texas Water Development Board
agenda_items.description: For low-cost financial assistance through the Flood Infrastructure Fund.

financial_items.description: Service contract for emergency repairs and modernization of elevators
Settlement of lawsuit Juanita Rodriguez v. The City of Dallas
Settlement of lawsuit Jose Posada v. City of Dallas, Texas
Grant from the Texas Veterans Commission
Issuance of Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds
Issuance of Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds
